channel.title: Uncategorized on Brettrics
channel.description: Recent content in Uncategorized on Brettrics

item.title: What gutting Net Neutrality is worth?
item.description: This is built from a simple web scrapper using R. It shows different aspects of which states sold out when it came to net neutrality. Data from https://www.theverge.com/2017/3/29/15100620/congress-fcc-isp-web-browsing-privacy-fire-sale

item.title: Where can you buy an Adventure Pass in Southern California?
item.description: Recently I went camping in Los Angeles and found it difficult to plan all the coordination, especially dealing with the purchasing of an Adventure Pass. Currently this is the website that provides a list of where you can purchase one. Well, I was not too impressed with just a list of vendors that I had to search and sift through. So I built a quick web scraper, geocoded each of the address and plotted them on an interactive map.

item.title: A Few Helpful R Packages
item.description: There are a few packages in R that I wish I was exposed to earlier, if I had an understanding of these packages earlier I would have been on Stack Overflow less. These are some of the most common packages that I use. tidyverse #hadlyverse dplyr #grouping tidyr #reshaping ggplot2 #plotting magrittr #pipefowarding lubridate #dates stringr #strings tidytext #moreStrings This list will continue to grow as I think of more packages.
